projects.title: Telegram Food Ordering Bot
projects.description: Automated food ordering system with inline menus, cart management, and payment integration via Telegram.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive Telegram bot that allows restaurant customers to browse menus, customize orders, manage their cart, and pay — all within Telegram. Features include inline keyboard menus, real-time order tracking, admin dashboard for restaurant owners, and integration with multiple payment providers.

projects.title: Developer Portfolio Website
projects.description: Modern, responsive portfolio website with dark/light mode, animations, blog, and integrated shop.
projects.longDescription: A fully custom portfolio website built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include CSS custom property theming, intersection observer animations, command palette, blog with reading progress, e-commerce cart, and Decap CMS integration. Scores 95+ on Lighthouse.

projects.title: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard for tracking user engagement, revenue metrics, and conversion funnels.
projects.longDescription: A web-based analytics dashboard that visualizes key business metrics in real-time. Built with a Node.js backend and vanilla frontend with Chart.js for data visualization. Features include customizable date ranges, exportable reports, team collaboration, and Slack notifications.

projects.title: Telegram Mini App — Online Store
projects.description: Full e-commerce experience inside Telegram with product catalog, cart, and Telegram Payments.
projects.longDescription: A Telegram Mini App that provides a complete shopping experience within Telegram. Users can browse products, filter by category, add items to cart, and checkout using Telegram's built-in payment system. The admin panel allows store owners to manage inventory and track orders.

projects.title: Academic Writing Platform
projects.description: Web platform connecting students with academic writers, featuring order management and secure file delivery.
projects.longDescription: A full-stack web application that streamlines the academic writing process. Students can place orders, upload requirements, communicate with writers, and receive completed work. Features include real-time chat, plagiarism checking integration, deadline tracking, and payment escrow.

projects.title: Content Automation CLI Tool
projects.description: Command-line tool that automates content publishing across multiple platforms simultaneously.
projects.longDescription: A Python CLI tool that takes a single piece of content (blog post, article, or social media update) and publishes it across multiple platforms — Medium, Dev.to, Hashnode, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Telegram channels. Supports scheduling, content formatting adaptation per platform, and analytics tracking.
